card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Euru%3DBucca, Antique Dragon Ruins
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Mana Arms

card.name: Babylon Gelg
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Icon

card.name: Dupoiz, Darma
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Duscissor, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Grigyan, Darma
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Gripage, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: De Szark, Demon Phoenix
card.text: ■ Gate of Moonless Night ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -3000 power until the End Step

card.name: Pakuchita
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand. ■ Icon

card.name: Weissing, Darma
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature in your graveyard. If it's a Magic Tool that costs 4 or less, put it into the battle zone, Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Ichigotchi Tank/Let's Goichigo
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ========================= ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Chaunics, Blizzard Faerie/Snowbo Patrol
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may return a creature from your mana zone to your hand. ========================= ■ Put 2 cards from your graveyard into your mana zone tapped.

card.name: Fabula Snail/Gorchop Trap
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have power 6000 or more cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 0. ========================= ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put all your opponent's creatures that have power 4000 or less into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Akashishima/Red Agraf
card.text: ■ Mach Fighter ========================= ■ One of your creatures gets +4000 power and can attack tapped or untapped creatures until the End Step

card.name: Nkavai, Daspell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures. They can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Ra Tobi Tol/Kendrick Harvest
card.text: ■ Last Burst ========================= ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone, then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Baredu, Daspell
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards, then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Kajigri, Daspell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Leledy Ba Gooba/Twinpact Map
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ This creature can't attack. ========================= ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a twinpact card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Kondama/Soul Femidoro
card.text: ■ Whenever you put a twinpact card into your mana zone, untap a card in your mana zone. ========================= ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If that card is a twinpact card, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: 卍 Gi Lugirin 卍/Bangoku Brain
card.text: ■ Void Gate of Moonless Night: When you cast a Magic Tool spell, you may choose a total of 4 of your Magic Tools from the battle zone and your graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. ■ blocker ■ Your creatures can't be blocked. ========================= ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Gyapudu, Daspell
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ Draw a card. ■ Icon
